response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just an object; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $10,000. Considering its immense worth, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $15,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for superior quality. Should you choose to accept, we promise a seamless transaction and delivery within the next 72 hours. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 15000}
